about_the_game:
Glimpse into a world of terror with the Retro Horror Story Demo!

In this preview of the full game, you’ll explore the twisted corridors of a haunted maze, solve a challenging puzzle, and come face to face with Mr. String, a relentless stalker that will stop at nothing to hunt you down.

What’s Included in the Demo?

Explore the Maze

Navigate a creepy maze filled with unsettling sights and a lingering sense of dread as you search for clues to escape.


Solve a Puzzle

Use your wits to solve a button-pushing mini-game where you must strategically push carts to progress.


Survive the Monster

After solving the puzzle, prepare for the nightmare to truly begin as a new terror awakens and starts pursuing you through the maze.


Meet Timmy

Encounter the mysterious spirit of a boy that seems to haunt the maze. Is he friend or foe?


A Thrilling Ending

Just when you think you’ve escaped, freedom slips through your fingers. But this is just the beginning... face the full horror in the complete game!

Demo Duration & Experience

The demo covers the first portion of the game, providing anywhere from 5 to 15 minutes of gameplay, depending on how quickly you can navigate the maze and avoid the dangers lurking within. With spooky music, eerie visuals, and a taste of the survival horror mechanics to come, this demo sets the tone for the terror that awaits in Retro Horror Story.

content_descriptors.notes: Retro Horror Story contains flashing images, violence, gore, minor jump scares and dark themes that may not be suitable for all players, Please play with caution.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel(R) Atom(TM) x5-z8350 CPU 1.44GHz or above

short_description: Step into the twisted maze of the Retro Horror Story Demo! A short yet intense slice of survival horror. Solve eerie puzzles, navigate the terrifying labyrinth, and survive the first encounter with Mr. String. Experience a gripping preview of what awaits in the full game!
